name: test
shortDescription: Runs unit tests in a project.
longDescription:
Takes the name of the project, as specified in the `projects` section of the `angular.json` workspace configuration file.
When a project name is not supplied, it will execute for all projects.

options.name: browsers
options.description: Override which browsers tests are run against.
options.descriptionCn: 覆盖要针对哪些浏览器运行测试。

options.name: code-coverage-exclude
options.description: Globs to exclude from code coverage.
options.descriptionCn: 排除在代码覆盖范围之外的 glob。

options.name: configuration
options.description:
One or more named builder configurations as a comma-separated list as specified in the "configurations" section in angular.json.
The builder uses the named configurations to run the given target.
For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations.
options.descriptionCn: 逗号分隔列表格式的一个或多个命名构建器配置，在 angular.json 的 `configurations` 部分中指定。构建器使用命名配置来运行给定的目标。有关更多信息，请参阅<https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations> 。

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
options.descriptionCn: 在控制台显示关于本命令的帮助信息。

options.name: include
options.description:
Globs of files to include, relative to workspace or project root. 
There are 2 special cases:
 - when a path to directory is provided, all spec files ending ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" will be included
 - when a path to a file is provided, and a matching spec file exists it will be included instead.
options.descriptionCn:
要包含的文件 glob，相对于工作区或项目根。有 2 种特殊情况：

- 当提供了目录的路径时，将包含所有以 `.spec.@(ts|tsx)` 结尾的测试规约文件

- 当提供了文件的路径并且存在匹配的测试规约文件时，它将被包含在内。

options.name: inline-style-language
options.description: The stylesheet language to use for the application's inline component styles.
options.descriptionCn: 用于应用程序的内联组件样式的样式表语言。

options.name: karma-config
options.description: The name of the Karma configuration file.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: poll
options.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.
options.descriptionCn: 启用并定义文件监视的轮询间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

options.name: polyfills
options.description: The name of the polyfills file.

options.name: preserve-symlinks
options.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.
options.descriptionCn: 当解析模块时，不要使用真实路径。如果未设置，则如果 NodeJS 启用了 --preserve-symlinks 选项，就默认为 `true`。

options.name: progress
options.description: Log progress to the console while building.
options.descriptionCn: 在构建时将进度记录到控制台。

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an application or a library.
options.descriptionCn: 要构建的项目名。可以是应用或库。

options.name: reporters
options.description: Karma reporters to use. Directly passed to the karma runner.
options.descriptionCn: 要使用的 Karma 汇报器。直接传给 Karma 运行器。

options.name: source-map
options.description: Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.
options.descriptionCn: 输出脚本和样式的源码映射信息。欲知详情，请参阅<https://angular.cn/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration>。

options.name: ts-config
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: watch
options.descriptionCn: 当文件更改时自动构建。

options.name: web-worker-ts-config
options.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.
options.descriptionCn: Web Worker 模块的 TypeScript 配置。

shortDescriptionCn: 运行某个项目中的单元测试。
longDescriptionCn: 获取在工作空间配置文件 `angular.json` 的 `projects` 部分指定的项目名称。如果未提供项目名称，它将对所有项目执行。
